review: Apple TV is $10-20 more than Roku - and it works better since you have airplay which is a wider bandwidth signal than bluetooth - but Roku has a lot more channel options - we have Time Warner and they have a Roku channel but Apple does not have a TW so we cannot do on demand through our Apple TV.  If you watch lots of movies on a DVD computer or have an extensive movie collection - Airplay is better- more Chromecast like - but Roku is better for streaming
